title: The Gingerbread Man, Steve's Financials Exposed, MTH, Racism In Queens and more.
itunes:title: The Gingerbread Man, Steve's Financials Exposed, MTH, Racism In Queens and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Imagine it straight up.  Uncle Steve tells a story about playing cards with some hood chicks and families of waterbugs.  How many alarms do you have to wake you up for work?  Fool #2 murders another one for the ladies that wear capri pants waaay too much.  You know you have way too much lip gloss on when..................  Tommy has tips that will help men get out of trouble.  Deny, delay, deflect was really the theme of Would You Rather until it went culinary.  The CLO simply says, "Bye Felicia!"  Plus, someone moved to Queens and is finally welcomed properly to Amurica and it wasn't the F U in jest from Coming To America either.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve has something for those that are experiencing pain.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Imagine it straight up.  Uncle Steve tells a story about playing cards with some hood chicks and families of waterbugs.  How many alarms do you have to wake you up for work?  Fool #2 murders another one for the ladies that wear capri pants waaay too much.  You know you have way too much lip gloss on when..................  Tommy has tips that will help men get out of trouble.  Deny, delay, deflect was really the theme of Would You Rather until it went culinary.  The CLO simply says, "Bye Felicia!"  Plus, someone moved to Queens and is finally welcomed properly to Amurica and it wasn't the F U in jest from Coming To America either.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve has something for those that are experiencing pain.
